remarks: A reflexive, symmetric, transitive relation is an equivalence relation on its domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
iserd.1 $e |- ( ph -> Rel R ) $.
iserd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x R y ) -> y R x ) $.
iserd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x R y /\ y R z ) ) -> x R z ) $.
iserd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A <-> x R x ) ) $.
iserd $p |- ( ph -> R Er A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d R x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
